title: Learning resources
text:
Questionnaire activity (part 1)
Fill in the questionnare “Task and Ego orientation in Sport Questionnaire” (Duda, 1989). There is no right or wrong answer.
We will compute the scores (page 2) later in the session and we will discuss what the scores mean

title: Learning resources
text:
Questionnaire activity (part 2)
This questionnaire measured your task and ego orientation
Complete page 2 of the questionnaire document to know your scores
